Requirements¶

This page outlines the requirements that you need to meet before you start working with the KNX IoT Point API environment.

Software requirements¶

To meet the software requirements, install the following tools:

  • nRF Connect SDK v2.3.0

  • nRF Command Line Tools

  • Wireshark (for tracing/sniffing purposes)

Hardware requirements¶

To meet the hardware requirements, ensure you have the following:

  • The Nordic’s nRF52840 Development Kit needed to run Light Switch Actuator and Light Switch Sensor samples

  • The Nordic’s nRF52840 Dongle as the Thread sniffer
